Package org.springframework.http.observation

@NonNullApi @NonNullFields package org.springframework.http.observation
Instrumentation for observing HTTP applications.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.springframework.http
    Contains a basic abstraction over client/server-side HTTP.
    org.springframework.http.observation.reactive
    Instrumentation for observing reactive HTTP applications.
    org.springframework.http.client
    Contains an abstraction over client-side HTTP.
    org.springframework.http.codec
    Provides implementations of Encoder and Decoder for web use.
    org.springframework.http.converter
    Provides an HttpMessageConverter abstraction to convert between Java objects and HTTP input/output messages.
    org.springframework.http.server
    Contains an abstraction over server-side HTTP.
